text: Ancyloxypha is a genus of butterflies in the family Hesperiidae. ==Species== * Ancyloxypha arene Edwards, 1871 \- Tropical Least Skipper * Ancyloxypha aurea Hayward, 1940 * Ancyloxypha dryas Hayward, 1942 * Ancyloxypha melanoneura C. & R. Felder, 1867 * Ancyloxypha nitedula Burmeister, 1878 * Ancyloxypha numitor Fabricius, 1793 \- Least Skipper * Ancyloxypha ramba Evans, 1955 ==References== Category:Hesperiidae
title: Ancyloxypha
